name: Down We Go
description:
Select a player(white blocks) and get them to the winners block(red floor). The floors will go down if a player or enemy occupies so hurry and get your players to safety. The winners and stationary(yellow) blocks will not fall down, although the stationary will fall down after many turns have passed.

Once a player is selected you can move them up,  left, down, right using W, A, S, D respectively. You can also swipe in the direction you want to move them once you've selected the player.

Keep moving or press SPACE to end your turn.

CONTROLS:

Left Click - selects players

W, A, S, D - moves players in that direction.

SPACE - ends turn.
